Lesson 1

A small review of what we've learned in lesson 1

Posted by Liam Haggerty on November 23, 2022 · 3 mins read

In this lesson, we went over a number of things, most notably getting farmilar with git.

This essentially entailed getting used to what github looks like. One new thing I learned was how to use github pages.

This is a specific link that will lead to your code that is in your repo. That leads me into my other point. HTML & CSS.

Above is a sample html script that shows most of what we were introduced to in this lesson. We also learned how to "style" your webpage to make it pop.
